attributes.action: Apologise to the nation for preventing UKIP from laying a wreath at the Cenotaph this year.
attributes.additional_details: UKIP is much more representational of the country than Plaid Cymru, the SNP or the DUP which are factional parties who have no role in representing the WHOLE of the population.  Mr Slippery needs to go on national television and radio to apologise to and beg the forgiveness of the people of this nation for depriving them of the opportunity to be properly represented at the Cenotaph today.
